mapper.sql: GUID, TOPORGID, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, INPUTTIME, CID, TELTIME, CNAME, TELNO, RESULT, PROMISEMONEY, PAYTIME, NEXTTIME, CONTENT, ATTITUDE, PAYTYPE, CELLPHONE

select tel.GUID, tel.TOPORGID, tel.INPUTUSERID, tel.INPUTORGID, tel.INPUTTIME, tel.CID, tel.TELTIME, tel.CNAME, tel.TELNO, b.ITEMNAME as RESULT, tel.PROMISEMONEY, tel.PAYTIME, tel.NEXTTIME, tel.CONTENT, c.ITEMNAME AS ATTITUDE, tel.PAYTYPE, tel.CELLPHONE from tel_record tel LEFT JOIN code_library b ON b.ITEMNO = tel.RESULT AND b.CODENO = 'TelResult' Left JOIN code_library c ON c.ITEMNO = tel.ATTITUDE AND c.CODENO = 'Attitude'
mapper.insert: insert into tel_record (GUID, TOPORGID, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, INPUTTIME, CID, TELTIME, CNAME, TELNO, RESULT, PROMISEMONEY, PAYTIME, NEXTTIME, CONTENT, ATTITUDE, PAYTYPE, CELLPHONE) values (#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toporgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teltime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promisemoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
